alert.note: Alert for St. Charles; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Watch issued January 21 at 8:49PM CST until January 23 at 9:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST SATURDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 expected. For the Hard Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26 possible. * WHERE...Upper Terrebonne County, and Upper Lafourche and St. Charles Parishes. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 11 PM this evening to 9 AM CST Saturday. For the Hard Freeze Watch, from Saturday evening through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: St. Charles; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne
